attributes.action: Publicly censure HSBC for supporting controversial legislation in Hong Kong
attributes.additional_details: HSBC has once again placed its commercial interests above the people and the society it serves. The legislation has been condemned by the UK government and has sparked unrest in Hong Kong.
attributes.background: Government should publicly censure HSBC for supporting the so called National Security Law imposed by China’s national government on Hong Kong

rejection.details:
You might like to sign and share this petition instead: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322078
